name: Tissue Paper (WIP)
description:
Tissue Paper is/will be a game about fragility and biology. 

I am Not A Dev so this project would have been impossible without Corgi Engine!

This is a work in progress, currently an explorable map and most of the story, missing the boss fights, sound design and inventory lmao. 

Someday I'll finish it. When that happens, it'll be updated here :3

CW: themes of death and cancer (although without the boss fights it's not too heavy)
